title: En Kanmaniye Lyrics Chinna Vathiyar Song Lyrics
stanzas:
evalavudhu
emaandhava kaadhula
poo vachchiruppa
ava kitta poi sollu

I love you
I love you
nee engum sella koodum
ennai meeri.

etti etti sendru
vettum paarvai kondu
sittrilam poovu
yaarai thedudhu

(sittrilam poovu
auto thedudhu
taxi thedudhu
innoru jodikku
aala kooda theudhu )

niththam niththam
ennai suttri suttri
vandhu vattamey
pott mogam theerndhadhaa

(aama theerndhu pochu
emptya suthitu iruken
ayya poitu varreengala)

nee ilaama naanaa
en poongodi
(aam amaa ama..)

I love you
I love you
nee engum sella koodum
ennai meeri.

I love you
I love you
nee engum sella koodum
ennai meeri.
